title: Cebuano (1980) Genesis Portion
description: Cebuano translation of the first four chapters of Genesis published in 1980. Cebuano, also referred to by most of its speakers simply and generically as Binisaya, is an Austronesian language, spoken in the southern Philippines.

language.name: Cebuano
language.area: Negros, Cebu, Bohol, Visayas and parts of Mindanao. Also in United States.
